revised_title: Progressive Improvements in Steam Engine Efficiency in Cornwall
tldr: The author discusses the improvements made in the efficiency of steam engines in Cornwall, focusing on the methods used to impart great angular velocities. The text covers the history of steam engine development, from its origins with Newcomen to the advancements made by Boulton and Watt. The author also presents calculations and data on the performance of various engines, highlighting the potential savings in fuel consumption.
